Package free.jin

Interface Summary
FriendsJinConnection An extension of the JinConnection interface which adds support for friend lists (notify lists on ICC).
GameListJinConnection An extension of the JinConnection interface which adds support for game lists.
JinConnection Defines the interface between the chess server and the client.
LoginDialog An interface dialogs collecting login information from the user must implement.
PGNJinConnection A tagging interface indicating that the implementing JinConnection generates ChessMoves which include a SAN representation of the move and Positions which include a FEN representation of the position, if the variant is an instance of ChesslikeGenericVariant.
SeekJinConnection An extension of the JinConnection interface which adds support for seeking functionality.
 

Class Summary
AboutDialog The "Help->About" dialog.
Game Represents a game of chess (or any other variant) on a chess server.
GameListItem An encapsulation of the properties that any game list item has.
HistoryListItem An encapsulation of the properties of a history list item.
InternalFrameSwitcher A class responsible for switching between the various internal Jin frames.
Jin Jin's main class.
JinDesktopManager The DesktopManager for Jin's main frame.
JinFocusManager Jin's focus manager.
JinFrame Jin's main frame.
JinFrameMenuBar The JMenuBar on Jin's main frame.
JinRootPane Jin's root pane.
LibListItem An encapsulation of the properties of a liblist list item.
LicenseDialog Displays licensing and copyright information about Jin and bundled software.
SearchListItem An encapsulation of the properties of a search result list item.
Seek A representation of a seek - a request for a player to play a game
Server This class encapsulates the various properties of a chess server.
ServerChoiceDialog The dialog that lets the user choose the server he wants to connect to.
ServerSpecificUserFileFilter Implements a FileChooser which accepts only user files which correspond to a given server.
StandardLoginDialog A partial, basic implementation of a LoginDialog.
StoredListItem An encapsulation of the properties of a stored list item.
User A holder for the user's settings and preferences.
